# Projects

## SIT C Project (Appointment Scheduler Database)

<p style="text-align: center;">
  <img src="img/appointment_scheduler.jpg" alt="Appointment Scheduler" style="width: 300px; height: 200px; object-fit: cover;" />
</p>

**Role**: Member  
**Skills**: C language  
**Year**: 2023  

Collaborated with a dynamic team to develop a **comprehensive Clinic Appointment Scheduling System** using both **ArrayList** and **LinkedList** data structures to assess their comparative performance. The system provides users with **efficient management capabilities**, allowing for operations such as:
- Displaying all appointments
- Inserting new appointments
- Querying specific appointments
- Updating appointment details
- Deleting appointments
- Saving appointment data to a file

**Robust error-handling mechanisms** are integrated to ensure a **reliable user experience**. The **user-friendly interface** enhances the overall experience, ensuring **smooth navigation** through various functionalities.

## SIT Python Project (HDB Analysis Prediction GUI)

<p style="text-align: center;">
  <img src="img/hdb_analysis_gui.jpg" alt="HDB Analysis GUI" style="width: 300px; height: 200px; object-fit: cover;" />
</p>

**Role**: Leader  
**Skills**: Python (Selenium, BeautifulSoup, Pandas, CustomTkinter, Matplotlib, CSV, etc.)  
**Year**: 2023  

Collaborated with a dynamic team to develop a **comprehensive HDB property analysis GUI**. The application not only provides **insightful data analytics** but also simplifies the property selection process through **efficient web scraping**, offering users a **multifaceted tool** for well-informed decision-making.

Key Features:
- **Predictive pricing models**: Users can forecast property prices.
- **Interactive data analytics charts**: Provide a visual understanding of market trends.
- **Export charts in PNG format**: Enhances user convenience.
